00007 * Methods to generate RF phase noise from noise spectrum and feedback noise
00008 * amplitude as a function of bunch length**

00013 #include <algorithm>
00014 #include <blond/constants.h>
00015 #include <blond/globals.h>
00016 #include <blond/llrf/LHCNoiseFB.h>
00017 #include <blond/math_functions.h>
00018 
00019 const ftype LHCNoiseFB::cfwhm = std::sqrt(2.0 / std::log(2.0));
00020 
00021 LHCNoiseFB::LHCNoiseFB(ftype bl_target, ftype gain, ftype factor,
00022                        ftype update_frequency, bool variable_gain,
00023                        f_vector_t bunch_pattern) {
00024     fX = 0.0;
00025     fBlTarg = bl_target;
00026     fBlMeas = bl_target;
00027     fA = factor;
00028     fNUpdate = update_frequency;
00029     fVariableGain = variable_gain;
00030     fBunchPattern = bunch_pattern;
00031     auto GP = Context::GP;
00032     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00033 
00034     if (fVariableGain) {
00035         fG.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00036         for (uint i = 0; i < fG.size(); ++i)
00037             fG[i] = gain * pow(RfP->omega_s0[0] / RfP->omega_s0[i], 2);
00038     } else {
00039         fG.resize(GP->n_turns + 1, gain);
00040     }
00041 
00042     if (fBunchPattern.empty()) {
00043         fFwhm = [&]() { return fwhm_single_bunch(); };
00044     } else {
00045         fFwhm = [&]() { return fwhm_multi_bunch(); };
00046         fBlMeasBBB.resize(fBunchPattern.size(), 0);
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 LHCNoiseFB::~LHCNoiseFB() {}
00051 
00052 // TODO test this function
00053 void LHCNoiseFB::track() {
00054     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00055     // Calculate PhaseNoise Feedback scaling factor as a function of measured
00056     // FWHM bunch length.*
00057 
00058     // Track only in certain turns
00059     if (RfP->counter % fNUpdate == 0) {
00060         // Update bunch length, every x turns determined in main file
00061         fFwhm();
00062 
00063         // Update noise amplitude-scaling factor
00064         fX = fA * fX + fG[RfP->counter] * (fBlTarg - fBlMeas);
00065 
00066         // Limit to range [0,1]
00067         fX = std::max(fX, 0.0);
00068         fX = std::min(fX, 1.0);
00069 
00070         // std::cout.precision(6);
00071         // std::cout << std::scientific << std::showpos;
00072         // std::cout << "fA " << fA << "\n";
00073         // std::cout << "fX " << fX << "\n";
00074         // std::cout << "fG[counter] " << fG[RfP->counter] << "\n";
00075         // std::cout << "fBlTarg " << fBlTarg << "\n";
00076         // std::cout << "fBlMeas " << fBlMeas << "\n";
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 ftype LHCNoiseFB::fwhm_interpolation(uint_vector_t index, ftype half_height) {
00081     auto Slice = Context::Slice;
00082     const auto time_resolution = Slice->bin_centers[1] - Slice->bin_centers[0];
00083 
00084     const auto first = index[0];
00085     const auto prev = first > 0 ? first - 1 : Slice->n_slices - 1;
00086     const auto left =
00087         Slice->bin_centers[first] -
00088         (Slice->n_macroparticles[first] - half_height) /
00089             (Slice->n_macroparticles[first] - Slice->n_macroparticles[prev]) *
00090             time_resolution;
00091 
00092     const auto last = index.back();
00093     auto right = 0.0;
00094     if (last < Slice->n_slices - 1) {
00095         right = Slice->bin_centers[last] +
00096                 (Slice->n_macroparticles[last] - half_height) /
00097                     (Slice->n_macroparticles[last] -
00098                      Slice->n_macroparticles[last + 1]) *
00099                     time_resolution;
00100     }
00101 
00102     // std::cout << "time_resolution " << time_resolution << '\n';
00103     // std::cout << "half_height " << half_height << '\n';
00104     // std::cout << "first " << first << '\n';
00105     // std::cout << "bin_centers[first] " << Slice->bin_centers[first] << '\n';
00106     // std::cout << "bin_centers[last] " << Slice->bin_centers[last] << '\n';
00107     // std::cout << "n_macroparticles[first] " << Slice->n_macroparticles[first]
00108     // << '\n';
00109     // std::cout << "n_macroparticles[prev] " << Slice->n_macroparticles[prev]
00110     // <<
00111     // '\n';
00112     // std::cout << "n_macroparticles[last] " << Slice->n_macroparticles[last]
00113     // <<
00114     // '\n';
00115     // std::cout << "n_macroparticles[last+1] " << Slice->n_macroparticles[last
00116     // +
00117     // 1] << '\n';
00118     // std::cout << "left " << left << '\n';
00119     // std::cout << "last " << last << '\n';
00120     // std::cout << "right " << right << '\n';
00121     // std::cout << "cfwhm " << cfwhm << '\n';
00122 
00123     return cfwhm * (right - left);
00124 }

00126 // TODO test this function
00127 void LHCNoiseFB::fwhm_single_bunch() {
00128     auto Slice = Context::Slice;
00129 
00130     // Single-bunch FWHM bunch length calculation with interpolation.
00131     auto i = mymath::max(Slice->n_macroparticles.data(), Slice->n_slices);
00132     ftype half_height = Slice->n_macroparticles[i] / 2;
00133 
00134     uint_vector_t index;
00135 
00136     for (uint i = 0; i < Slice->n_slices; ++i)
00137         if (Slice->n_macroparticles[i] > half_height)
00138             index.push_back(i);
00139 
00140     if (index.empty()) {
00141         // std::cerr << "[LHCNoiseFB] ERROR! index vector should have at least
00142         // one element\n";
00143         return;
00144     }
00145 
00146     fBlMeas = fwhm_interpolation(index, half_height);
00147 }
00148 
00149 // TODO test this function
00150 void LHCNoiseFB::fwhm_multi_bunch() {
00151 
00152     // Multi-bunch FWHM bunch length calculation with interpolation.*
00153 
00154     auto Slice = Context::Slice;
00155     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00156 
00157     // Find correct RF buckets
00158     auto phi_RF = RfP->phi_RF[0][RfP->counter];
00159     auto omega_RF = RfP->omega_RF[0][RfP->counter];
00160     // std::cout << phi_RF << "\n";
00161     // std::cout << omega_RF << "\n";
00162     f_vector_t bucket_min(fBunchPattern.size());
00163     for (uint i = 0; i < bucket_min.size(); ++i)
00164         bucket_min[i] =
00165             (phi_RF + 2 * constant::pi * fBunchPattern[i]) / omega_RF;
00166 
00167     f_vector_t bucket_max(bucket_min.size());
00168     for (uint i = 0; i < bucket_min.size(); ++i)
00169         bucket_max[i] = bucket_min[i] + 2 * constant::pi / omega_RF;
00170 
00171     // Bunch-by-bunch FWHM bunch length
00172     for (uint i = 0; i < fBunchPattern.size(); ++i) {
00173         uint_vector_t bind;
00174         for (uint j = 0; j < Slice->n_slices; ++j) {
00175             if ((Slice->bin_centers[j] - bucket_min[i]) *
00176                     (Slice->bin_centers[j] - bucket_max[i]) < 0)
00177                 bind.push_back(j);
00178         }
00179 
00180         ftype hheight = 0;
00181         for (const auto& j : bind) {
00182             if (Slice->n_macroparticles[j] > hheight)
00183                 hheight = Slice->n_macroparticles[j];
00184         }
00185 
00186         hheight = hheight / 2;
00187 
00188         uint_vector_t index;
00189         auto k = 0;
00190         for (const auto &j : bind) {
00191             if (Slice->n_macroparticles[j] > hheight)
00192                 index.push_back(bind[k]);
00193             k++;
00194         }
00195         // std::cout << "index size = " << index.size() << "\n";
00196         if (index.empty()) {
00197             // std::cerr << "[LHCNoiseFB] ERROR! index vector should have at least one element\n";
00198             continue;
00199         }
00200         fBlMeasBBB[i] = fwhm_interpolation(index, hheight);
00201     }
00202 
00203     fBlMeas = mymath::mean(fBlMeasBBB.data(), fBlMeasBBB.size());
00204 }
